Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kenton
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and Cicero due to, construction near at 59th/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and Cicero due to, construction near at 59th/Kenton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/47th
ShortDescription: SB 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, and Damen due to construction near Damen/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, and Damen due to construction near Damen/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland, X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Madison, Paulina and Fulton: due to street blockage near  Ashland/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland,  #X9  Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Madison, Paulina and Fulton: due to street blockage near  Ashland/Lake.
